p: In conclusion, this trial is designed to determine the effects of the ACEIs/ARBs withheld strategy, as compared to the ACEIs/ARBs continued approach, on perioperative hypotension and postoperative outcomes in older patients who undergo non-cardiac surgical procedures. The implementation and reporting of this trial will be in accordance with the CONSORT guideline ( 21). We expect that our results will offer an evidence-based perioperative ACEIs/ARBs therapy for older hypertensive adults undergoing non-cardiac surgery.
